segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor woman is so engrossed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, and she's blind to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking everything for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is about to give way under the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, like he needs more to juggle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl just stands there, expecting her reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how innocent mischief can lead to harm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow is ruining the cabinets slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, everything is perfect, which makes this worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching their unaware adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one sees the puddle spreading.
segments.speaker: PAR
